issue.title: Exclude .factorypath from git and RAT plugin
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13823](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13823). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Eclipse IDE might generate `.factorypath` configuration files when annotation processing is enabled.

Those files are similar to other Eclipse files like `.classpath` or `.settings`, and should be excluded from Git and the RAT plugin configuration

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13823?focusedCommentId=17408543) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11042
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11042>
